UniprotID	Q9BQA9
Accession	Q9BQA9;E1B6X3;Q96NR1
EntryName	CYBC1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Cytochrome b-245 chaperone 1 (Essential for reactive oxygen species protein) (Eros)
GeneName	CYBC1 C17orf62 EROS
Length	187
Function	Functions as a chaperone necessary for a stable expression of the CYBA and CYBB subunits of the cytochrome b-245 heterodimer (PubMed:30361506). Controls the phagocyte respiratory burst and is essential for innate immunity (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Endoplasmic reticulum membrane
